attributes.action: STOP the abuse of a Citizen's Human Rights to Justice by the Legal System of England's failure to allow an Individual to present their case to a Court on the grounds that submissions by a litigant in person are not compliant with the bureaucracy of ‘THE SYSTEM'.

attributes.background:
This report serves to highlight the criminal financial and emotional abuse suffered by Marjorie Evelyn Mary Wills (MEMW) and her son Robert James Wills (RJW).
The death of MEMW on 19th October 2002 was a direct consequence of the criminal actions of Oxfordshire County Council Social Services Care Management Department Banbury (OCCSSCMDB) and Alfred Truman Solicitors (AT) to submit a fraudulent application to the Public Guardianship Office in order to obtain an order from the Court of Protection (CoP) to use monies, the responsibility of RJW by way of Enduring Power of Attorney (EPA), purportedly to pay for private nursing and care costs.  

For all the facts visit:   www.freewebs.com/robjameswills
